summary:
Sirius: I feel like shite. 
Remus: Have you eaten anything bad? 
Sirius: Just the usual?
Remus: What did you have for breakfast?...
body:
Sirius: I feel like shite.

Remus: Have you eaten anything bad?

Sirius: Just the usual?

Remus: What did you have for breakfast?

Sirius: Chocoballs cereal.

Remus: Oh Merlin, I didn’t even know Chocoballs made a cereal.

Sirius: They don’t, it’s just Chocoballs in a bowl with milk.

Remus:

blog.name: beautifuldreams-blog
blog.title: Beautiful Dreams
blog.description: O BeautifulDreams surgiu como forma de complementar o Blog para mostrar ao mundo notícias e opinião sobre o cinema, televisão e animes. Espero que gostem.

summary: Os melhores filmes para ver quando se está doente
title: Os melhores filmes para ver quando se está doente
body:
Os melhores filmes para ver quando se está doente

O inverno está a chegar e com ele aquele tempo frio que só temos vontade de estar em casa embrulhados numa mantinha quente, comando na mão e a ver um filme. Principalmente quando está a chover. Ou então somos “obrigados” a estar em repouso quando a gripe nos encontra. Estar em casa doente é desconfortável e desgastante, mas quando tal acontece a televisão também pode ser a nossa melhor aliada.…

View On WordPress

blog.name: hemavvls
blog.title: Don't know
blog.description: honestly here for fan art and edits

body:
Unpopular Opinion

First of all……Kudos to all the fantastic people who wrote wonderful dramione fan fiction!!! I have read a lot of dramione fics some cliche “she saves him”….. To fics who have (almost) stayed true to the characters written in the book and still managed to write a great fic!!

Also I like the head cannons about Draco realising post war about the things which he did were not at all right…. We can see it in the way Scorpius is raised (considering cursed Child cannon here)

But that said I never got the appeal of Draco Malfoy on the basis of films and books alone…. Like he is such a d**k in the books and really not in the “oh he is such bad boy” way but in a “cowardly, sniveling, idot” way…. Also Tom Feltons HOT…. But in the movies his platinum blonde hair and sneer with his albino skin is not attractive at all….!!!

Any appeal that I have toward Draco is mainly due to fan arts and some really good head cannons!!!

People like to picture the 2nd pic as Draco but it’s actually Tom felton’s face and personality that majority of the people are in love with and project it on Draco ( there’s no fault in that… You do you…. Just saying)

PS: fan art version Draco Malfoy though can get it 🔥

blog.name: yahoosodapop
blog.title: Making Lemonade
blog.description:
Mainly a shipping blog.

Current Ship: Kylo Ren / Ben x Rey (Star Wars), Newt x Tina (Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them), Doctor x River (Doctor Who) .

Naruto x Hinata (Naruto), Zelda x Link (Legend of Zelda), Cloud x Tifa (Final Fantasy 7), Phoenix x Maya (Ace Attorney), Sheldon x Amy (Big Bang Theory), Nick x Adalind (Grimm), Reggie x Betty (Archie Comics), Rick x Lisa (Macross Saga), Katniss x Peeta (Hunger Games), Arnold x Helga (Hey Arnold)

Crack/Older Ships: Ryoga x Ukyou (Ranma 1/2), Lina x Zelgadiss (Slayers), Ichigo x Rukia (Bleach)

Abandoned Ships: Olicity (CW Arrow)

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Rose Weasley, Louis Weasley, Albus Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

blog.name: jcinkgalore
blog.title: jcink galore
blog.description: jcink galore is a jcink resource tumblr for roleplay advertising and player interaction. we feature an advertising base, as well as a way to build community between jcink roleplayers. we only accept jcink hosted sites.

summary: YHE is a six year old post potter canon site that is a combination of Rowling Canon and our own.  It is a site created by fans...
caption:
YHE is a six year old post potter canon site that is a combination of Rowling Canon and our own.  It is a site created by fans and built upon by fans.  We are set in 2028.  Focused on the United Kingdom with locations all over England, Ireland, Scotland and soon Wales. Plots are character driven with monthly events that offer a way to meet new people with no effort. The more members we have the more locations we will add. We have no word count and a shipper app with relaxed activity rules. If you have an idea you have wanted to try in the HP world we are the place for you to do that.

INDEX | RULES | FACE CLAIM | WANT ADS | DISCORD
